}

body.raw:
{
  "title": "YourOwn",
  "type": "PROJECT",
  "startDate": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
  "endDate": null,
  "isCurrent": true,
  "roleTitle": "Team Lead & System Architect",
  "organization": "Personal Project",
  "location": "Remote",
  "summaryShort": "A 'dogfooded' portfolio CMS designed for developers to own their professional identity and data.",
  "summaryLong": "YourOwn is a full-stack platform that separates life data from visual presentation, allowing for dynamic, multi-layout portfolio generation.",
  "problemStatement": "Existing portfolio builders are either too rigid for developers or too complex for quick updates, often resulting in stale 'outdated' sites.",
  "solutionDetails": "Architected a decoupled system using a 'Display-First' approach, populating the data layer via a robust API before building the management UI.",
  "impactBullets": [
    "Designed a flexible PostgreSQL/Prisma schema to support dynamic multi-layout presentations.",
    "Implemented seamless client-side state management using React Query for optimized fetching.",
    "Created a portable JSON export system to ensure users maintain total ownership of their data."
  ],
  "techStack": ["React Query", "Node.js", "Prisma", "PostgreSQL", "System Architecture", "API Design"],
  "metadata": {
    "links": {
      "github": "https://github.com/your-repo/yourown",
      "live": "",
      "demo": "path/to/architecture-diagram.png"
    }
  }
}
